creditline: The Rebecca and Ben Field Endowment for Art Acquisition
description: Hanging from ten strands of twisted leather the whistle is carved and painted in bright red, blue, yellow, black and white pigments.
text: The eerie cry of a whistle is one thing, but an orchestra of dozens of whistles played at a funeral evokes the Otherworld. The whistle is in the stylized shape of a person wearing a prestige cap popular in the Cameroonian Grasslands, and can also be played individually to invoke personal protection.
title: Whistle
